name: 林筱玫
objective:
本課程旨在讓學生掌握在移動設備上設計手機遊戲的專業知識和實踐技能。 學生將通過參與實踐項目獲得手機遊戲設計方面的專業知識。 課程內容涵蓋行動裝置遊戲案例研究與市場分析、遊戲設計策劃、行動裝置軟體應用、遊戲風格設計等。 教學方式包括課堂講授和項目實施，以項目報告和演示作為考核依據。

This course aims to equip students with specialized knowledge and practical skills for designing mobile games on mobile devices. Students will gain expertise in mobile game design by engaging in hands-on projects. The course curriculum covers case studies and market analysis of mobile games, game design planning, mobile game software applications, and game-style design. The teaching methods involve classroom lectures and project implementation, with project reports and presentations as the basis for assessment.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Mobile Game Design and Industry Trends
Week 2: Mobile Game Case Studies and Market Analysis
Week 3: Mobile Game Design Principles and User Experience
Week 4: Mobile Game Design Documentation (GDD) 
Week 5: Mobile Game Art and Visual Design
Week 6: Mobile Game Software Design and Development (Part 1)
Week 7: Mobile Game Software Design and Development (Part 2)
Week 8: Mobile Game Testing and Quality Assurance
Week 9: Monetization Strategies for Mobile Games
Week 10: Game Balancing and Difficulty Design
Week 11: Mobile Game Marketing and Promotion
Week 12: Intellectual Property and Legal Considerations in Mobile Game Development
Week 13-16: Project Development and Implementation
Week 17: Project Presentation and Evaluation
Week 18: Course Conclusion and Reflection
